Member Function Documentation

void brics_3d::PointCorrespondenceKDTree::createNearestNeighborCorrespondence ( PointCloud3D *  pointCloud1,
PointCloud3D *  pointCloud2,
std::vector< CorrespondencePoint3DPair > *  resultPointPairs 
) [virtual]

Establishes a point to point correspondence with nearest neighborhood search.

Parameters:
[in]pointCloud1Pointer to first point cloud
[in]pointCloud2Pointer to second point cloud
[out]resultPointPairsPointer where to store the resulting point correspondences. If no correspondences are found, this vector will be empty.

Implements brics_3d::IPointCorrespondence.
